# Program to find the union of two sets using TensorFlow

import tensorflow as tf

# Create two sets
set1 = {1, 2, 3, 4, 5}
set2 = {3, 4, 5, 6, 7}

# Create a set object
set_union = tf.sets.set_union(set1, set2)

# Print the union of the two sets
print("The union of the two sets is: ", set_union.values.numpy())
